oai_dc:dc.dc:title: PHASE-DIAGRAM FOR THE ELECTRON-DOPED ND2-XCEXCUOY SUPERCONDUCTING SYSTEM
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, OG
PADALIA, BD
PRAKASH, O
SUBA, K
NARLIKAR, AV
GUPTA, LC
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: single-crystals
nd1.85ce0.15cuo4-y
transport
reduction
growth
ce
cu
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We report a refined phase diagram for the electron-doped Nd2-xCexCuOy superconducting system in the range 0.120 less-than-or-equal-to x less-than-or-equal-to 0.190 with DELTAx=0.005. It is found that the highest T(c)(rho=0) approximately 17 K is confined to the very narrow range 0.145 less-than-or-equal-to x less-than-or-equal-to 0.150; a T(c onset) approximately 24 K with sharp superconducting transition is also observed. An attempt is made to understand the T(c) dependence on the variation of the oxygen content (y) in the Nd2-xCexCuOy system.
